pages.text: A rudimentary, yet effective way of collecting $(aura) early on is the $(item)Natural Altar$(). After creating the setup shown on the following page, the altar will start slowly draining $(aura) in the vicinity. However, it is not strong enough to cause major damage, making it only drain until there is none left in the area.$(br)The collected $(aura) can then be used in several ways, $(l:using/altar)infusing items$() for instance.
Creating the $(item)Natural Altar$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
